title: Thursday Night Football, Broncos Ownership, Sands Casino Talks
itunes:title: Thursday Night Football, Broncos Ownership, Sands Casino Talks
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch discuss last week's Thursday Night Football ratings, Peyton Manning denying involvement in Denver Broncos ownership groups, and NY Mets owner Steve Cohen in talks on Sands casino near Citi Field. All that and more on this Monday edition of the Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
